name: Ziphius
description: The Ziphius is a gargantuan aberration embodying the secrets of the deep sea with a formidable aquatic presence, featuring a dorsal fin and sharp beak.
memorable: Its ability to charge at foes and inflict significant damage, along with its capacity to swallow foes, makes the Ziphius a unique threat.
goals: The Ziphius typically seeks to dominate its aquatic territory and overpower adversaries.
relations: It might be found alongside other sea creatures or servitors of deep-sea deities.
environment: The Ziphius thrives in deep aquatic environments, such as oceans and lakes.
strengths: Possesses high mobility in water, resistance to cold damage, and impressive durability against non-magical attacks.
weaknesses: Ineffective in social interactions due to low Charisma and reliant on underwater breathing.
attacks: Can deliver vicious attacks using its claws and beak, and it can perform a deadly engulfing move by swallowing foes.
most_powerful_ability: Charge ability which allows it to deal extra slashing damage if it charges at a target.
senses: The Ziphius has blindsight out to 120 feet, enhancing its awareness in water.
skills: It has a good perception skill, allowing it to notice changes in its surroundings effectively.
additional_information: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
Can create a mental bond to read surface thoughts and gain advantages in combat.
Doubles damage to objects due to its Siege Monster trait.
test_queries: gargantuan sea creature with mind control
powerful underwater monster with charging ability
deep sea aberration that swallows prey
monster with strong physical attacks in water
